title: About that new 'snowball' mystery gift.
body: If I were to gift someone a legendary skin, who would get the mystery gift ?

replies.body:
Hey Jencarna,

While I'm not personally sure of the answer to this question, you may want to reach out to Riot Games Player Support where they can give you a definitive answer on the topic:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Let me know what they say!

EDIT: Got an answer!
> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=PBE,application-id=cMKtzQHY,discussion-id=n5sUjeVy,comment-id=00160000,timestamp=2015-11-24T18:42:44.372+0000)
>
> If you gift it, the person on the receiving end gets both.
